settings.description: Ethel M Chocolates Private Online Tasting Highlight Video. Showcases the Tasting Experience and some of the key points in the event.

settings.text:
Interested in a private online tasting? Click Here to fill out our form or complete it at the bottom of this page to be contacted.

Online Tastings have a required minimum spend of $500 and must be booked 3 weeks in advance.

Celebrate the holidays with an Ethel M Chocolates Private Online Tasting. Gather your friends, family, or colleagues for a delightful and gourmet experience. Our chocolatier will guide you through a video call on the platform of your choice for an indulgent tasting while you discover the chocolate-making process from bean to box. Enjoy exquisitely curated boxes of our handcrafted gems, including a limited-time holiday collection. 

Select your chocolate tasting experience from our options below, and we’ll handle the rest!

Upon request, we can also provide a curated list of wine and beer that pair perfectly with our handcrafted chocolates.

This 16pc Limited-Time Holiday Collection in a Collectible Tin features some of our seasonal chocolates and is the perfect way to celebrate the Holidays together! Includes insulated tote bag and tasting mats.

$60 Per Kit

settings.text:
Chocolatier
Each tasting will be led by one of our Chocolatiers for a flat $100 fee. Ask about upgrading your private online tasting with our Chief Chocolatier for an additional fee.

Shipping
Domestic Shipping is $12 per address.

Online Tastings have a required minimum spend of $500 and must be booked 3 weeks in advance.
